summary: Current pH is slightly below average; TDS is above average; temperature is below average.

insights.recommendation: Monitor pH closely; consider adding pH buffers if it drops further.
Evaluate feeding rates and waste accumulation; consider water changes if TDS continues to rise.
Ensure water temperature is maintained within optimal range for tilapia (26-30°C); consider heating if necessary.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.038 / 7.016 / 7.088 (trend: down)
• TDS avg/min/max: 315.046 / 295.1 / 347.6 ppm (trend: down)
• Temp avg/min/max: 26.911 / 24.19 / 30.44 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
